casebody.data:
CLARKE, ex rel.
v.
MIKHAIL, et al. No. 29P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Gary K. Shipman, Wilmington, Attorney at Law, for Clarke, Timothy (Representative), et al. *514W. Cory Reiss, Wilmington, for Clarke, Timothy (Representative), et al. C. Andrew Childers, for Clarke, Timothy (Representative), et al. B. John D. Martin, Wilmington, for Mikhail, Ashraf Gad Bakhom (M.D.), et al. Colleen N. Shea, Wilmington, for Mikhail, Ashraf Gad Bakhom (M.D.), et al.

Kara O. Gansmann, Wilmington.

Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Raleigh, for Mikhail, Ashraf Gad Bakhom.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of February 2016 by Plaintiff to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
